title: COVID-19: Delhi logs 325 fresh cases, zero fatality
description: Read more about COVID-19: Delhi logs 325 fresh cases, zero fatality on Devdiscourse
content:
Delhi reported 325 fresh COVID-19 cases and zero fatality due to the viral disease on Thursday, while the positivity rate was recorded at 2.39 per cent, according to data shared by the city health department.

title: Gujarat sees 11 new COVID-19 cases; active tally at 162

content:
Gujarat on Thursday registered 11 new cases of coronavirus that raised the tally of infections to 12,24,118, an official from the state health department said.

title: Having allergic asthma actually protects people from a severe case of COVID-19: Study
description: Could pollen and seasonal allergens actually be protecting some people from COVID-19? Researchers in North Carolina found that people with allergic asthma are less likely to have a severe infection.
content: CHAPEL HILL, N.C. (StudyFinds.org) – Could pollen and seasonal allergens actually be protecting some people from COVID-19? Researchers in North Carolina found that people with allergic asthma are less likely to have a severe infection. For people wit... [3546 chars]

title: Italy reports 64,951 coronavirus cases on Thursday, 149 deaths
description:
Italy reported 64,951 COVID-19 related cases on Thursday, against 62,037 the day before, the health ministry said, while the number of deaths fell to 149 from 155.
The total number of intensive care patients fell to 420 from a previous 449. Some 438,375 tests for COVID-19 were carried out in the past day, compared with a previous 419,995, the health ministry said.
content: Italy reported 64,951 COVID-19 related cases on Thursday, against 62,037 the day before, the health ministry said, while the number of deaths fell to 149 from 155. Italy has registered 161,336 deaths linked to COVID-19 since its outbreak emerged in F... [680 chars]

title: U.S. govt to cut back on 'do not travel' COVID advisories
description: The U.S. State Department said Thursday it will sharply cut back on "Do Not Travel" advisories for international destinations after public health officials announced a change in how they will assess COVID-19 concerns.
content: The U.S. State Department said Thursday it will sharply cut back on "Do Not Travel" advisories for international destinations after public health officials announced a change in how they will assess COVID-19 concerns. Out of about 215 countries and t... [1012 chars]

title: Pfizer to seek Covid-19 booster for healthy 5- to 11-year-olds
description: In a small study, 140 youngsters who'd already gotten two shots were given a booster six months later, and researchers found the extra shot generally revved up their immune response.
content:
Pfizer said Thursday it wants to expand its COVID-19 booster shots to healthy elementary-age kids.
US health authorities already urge everyone 12 and older to get one booster dose for the best protection against the newest variants — and recently gav... [1993 chars]

title: World News Roundup: Britain reaches deal to resettle asylum seekers in Rwanda; Worldwide COVID cases surpass 500 million as Omicron variant BA.2 surges and more
description: Finland will make a decision in the next few weeks, Prime Minister Sanna Marin said on Wednesday. title: Covaxin’s Phase 2/3 trials in US put on hold
description: The phase 2/3 clinical trials of Bharat Biotech’s COVID-19 vaccine Covaxin have been put on hold in the US by the Food and Drug Administration.
